name: Gaming Cafe - PC Building Game
description:
Build your multiplayer Internet gaming cafe.

-> Assemble CPUs and install graphics card, lcd monitor, mouse, keyword and accessaries
-> Place up-to 12 Gaming PCs in your Internet cafe
-> Buy, Crack and install different online games in your systems
-> Arrange gaming competitions to increase customer footprint
-> Earn from each customer, increase your RP and upgrade your gaming cafe
